portfolio.name: Integrated Manufacturing Projects
portfolio.description: Internal software projects for industrial automation, computer vision, and mobile tooling

projects.name: CERBERUS
projects.full_name: Cummings Electrical Robotic Breaker & Equipment Recognition Unified System
projects.description: An automated system combining robotic arm control, linear gantry positioning, and AI-powered vision to document electrical panels. Uses YOLO object detection and OCR to identify breaker part numbers and phases.
highlights: 6-DOF robotic arm with precise camera positioning
Custom YOLO models for 15+ breaker classes
Multi-model AI pipeline with local/cloud fallback
Edge processing on Raspberry Pi

projects.name: Cummings CV
projects.tagline: Enterprise video analytics for industrial safety
projects.description: A video analytics platform for industrial monitoring, safety compliance, and visual data capture. Integrates with multi-channel NVR systems supporting 8 simultaneous camera feeds with real-time AI inference.
highlights: 8-channel live monitoring with real-time inference
Instance segmentation for privacy-preserving anonymization
YOLOv11-Large with 27.6M parameters
Web-based dashboard with camera selector

projects.name: ORION
projects.full_name: Operational Recognition Intelligence and Observation Network
projects.tagline: Advanced multi-camera AI vision platform for safety and analytics
projects.description: AI vision system combining live stream monitoring and batch video processing. Features YOLOv11-Large models, ByteTrack persistent tracking, and two-pass processing for 2-5x speed improvements. Planned hybrid edge/cloud architecture with Hailo AI accelerator.
highlights: Dual modes: Live monitoring + batch video processing
Two-pass processing: 2-5x faster than traditional methods
YOLOv11-Large with 51M parameters for superior accuracy
Instance segmentation with colored masks for people
ByteTrack integration for persistent cross-frame IDs
HTML detection reports with timelines
Comprehensive logging system
8-camera DVR integration via RTSP/HTTPS
Planned: Hailo AI accelerator (26 TOPS) on Raspberry Pi
Planned: Cross-camera tracking with TV dashboard

projects.name: Panel Scanner iOS
projects.tagline: Real-time electrical panel detection on iOS
projects.description: A professional iOS application for electrical contractors featuring on-device ML inference, AR visualization, and smart OCR for panel identification. Exports synchronized video recordings with structured JSON/CSV data.
highlights: 30 FPS on-device inference with Neural Engine
AR mode with floating 3D labels
Smart OCR with user confirmation
Video + JSON/CSV synchronized export
